shortdesc.ph: Reports the details of music collection.

p.codeblock: void onMusicCollectionResult( String requestId, int status, int page, int pageSize, int total, Music[] list);
virtual void onMusicCollectionResult(const char* requestId, MusicContentCenterStatusCode status, agora_refptr<MusicCollection> result) = 0;
public abstract void OnMusicCollectionResult(string requestId, MusicContentCenterStatusCode status, MusicCollection result);
final void Function(String requestId, MusicContentCenterStatusCode status, MusicCollection result)? onMusicCollectionResult;

section.p: This callback occurs when you call the method to get music collection by music chart ID, and reports the details of music assets in the collection.

pd.p: The request status. See for details.

The request statuses are as follows:
0: The request succeeds.
1: 请求失败。

plentry.pd: 当前页面编号，默认从 1 开始。
当前音乐资源列表的总页面数量，最大值为 50。
The total number of music assets in the collection.

pd.ph: The details of musci assets in the collection.
